summary: The Doctor is a popular sci-fi character from a BBC TV show. They are an alien who travels through time and space in a ship called the TARDIS. The role has been played by 14 different actors since the show started in 1963. When an actor changes, it's explained in the show as 'regeneration,' a special power that lets Time Lords transform. The Doctor has also appeared in books, comics, and movies, and is currently portrayed by Ncuti Gatwa.
title: The Doctor
